name: Traveling Around Using Patches of Mist
desc: Transform into kuuhenki of different forms to take refuge in mists of <color=#FFE14BFF>different colors</color>.

galleryCharacter.key: Traveling Around Using Patches of Mist

imgDesc.text:
Transform into kuuhenki of different forms to take refuge in mists of
different colors.

galleryCharacter.key: Traveling Around Using Patches of Mist

imgDesc.text:
Press to switch forms and exit the mist of
the same color to roam to another
different colored mist.
